paper.title: Minimisation of data collection by active learning

author.org: Sch. of MPCE, Macquarie Univ., NSW, Australia
Sch. of MPCE, Macquarie Univ., NSW, Australia

paper.abstract: Uses the u0027query-by-committeeu0027 approach for building an active scheme for data collection. In this method data gathering is reduced to a minimum, yet modelling accuracy is uncompromised. The authorsu0027 active querying criterion is determined by whether or not several models agree when they are fitted to random subsamples of a small amount of collected data. Experiments with neural network models to establish the feasibility of the authorsu0027 algorithm have produced encouraging results.
